```{r,fig.dim=c(6,6)}
par(mar=c(0,0,0,0),pty="s")
plot(c(-16,-16,16,16),c(-16,16,16,-16),"l",xlim=c(-20,20),ylim=c(-20,20),axes=F,ann=F)

```



```{r}
x = c(2,6,5,6,6,
      1,4,4,5,6,
      1,3,5,5,6,
      2,3,3,4,6,
      2,3,4,4,5,
      2,2,3,5,5,
      1,1,2,2,6,
      2,3,6,6,6,
      1,3,5,6,6,
      1,3,3,4,5,
      2,3,3,4,5,
      1,2,2,4,6,
      2,3,3,4,6,
      2,4,4,6,6,
      1,2,2,3,6,
      2,3,3,4,6,
      3,3,4,5,6,
      4,5,6,6,6,
      2,2,3,5,6,
      2,5,5,6,6,
      2,3,4,6,6,
      2,3,3,3,4,
      2,3,3,4,6)

n = length(x)
xbar = mean(x)
print(n)
print(xbar)
s = sd(x)
print(s)
me = 2*s/sqrt(n)
print(me)
print(xbar-3.5)
```
